text: @realDonaldTrump Said the fascist dictator. #COVID19 will get you #Trump the more deny it the more it grows  Therefore you’re risking our lives while you refuse accept reality. You won’t  even wear a little mask and yet you want us to send our kids to school? #Trump #Fauci #fail #Teachers #Biden

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
